results.title: Indiscretion of an American wife = Stazione Termini
results.creator_credit: Selznick Releasing Organization and Vittorio De Sica
results.brief_description: Mary is an American housewife trying to make the heart-rending decision of whether to go back to her husband and family or remain in Rome with her lover, Giovanni, a university professor she has met during her stay. Most of the story takes place in the Rome railway station, where Mary and Giovanni meet for one last desperate rendezvous. Their search for a secluded spot where they can be together, threatens to expose their illicit affair. However, an understanding railroad commissioner releases the two and Mary is permitted to return to her husband with an unsullied reputation. Cast includes: Jennifer Jones, Montgomery Clift, Gino Cervi and Richard Beymer.

results.title: Indiscreet
results.brief_description: A NATO officer meets a beautiful actress and falls in love with her, but protects himself by saying he is married. The script of this film was written by Norman Krasna, based on his play “Kind Sir”. It stars Cary Grant and Ingrid Bergman.

results.title: Indigenous Australians : an Aboriginal community focus
results.brief_description: An interactive CDROM from NSW TAFE which is the first to draw on the comprehensive knowledge and expertise of Aboriginal community members and is an invaluable teaching resource. The concept behind the CD ROM is to let members of various Aboriginal communities become teachers of their rich culture. A resource guide accompanies the CD ROM.

results.title: Indian village
results.brief_description: Sucksdorff, the distinguished Swedish director visited India in 1951 and made two films “Wind and the river” and “Indian village”. “Indian village” was intended to be shown throughout India to persuade peasants to discard their centuries-old methods of cultivation and village administration and to adopt modern methods of co-operation. The story Sucksdorff has chosen is centred on a village in which the people are dependent on an old well which dries up in the hot season, bringing drought and starvation.
